guest_signals: Wants the top trim; cares about presence, premium feel, 'best one', and how it looks/feels when arriving.
recommended_trim_path: Limited → Calligraphy (or highest-available premium trim package)
on_lot_handles: Exterior presence/stance; premium cabin materials; premium lighting/trim details; dual display/tech presentation.
demo_60_seconds: Stand 10–15 feet back: 'first impression.' Walk up: point out signature design details. Open door: invite them to touch seat/cabin materials. Sit: show the displays and one premium comfort feature.
translate_line: What that means for you is a vehicle that represents you the moment you arrive.
invite_next_step: Let's take a short loop so you can feel the quiet, comfort, and premium ride.
coach_roleplay_prompt: Role-play the 'arrival moment' close in one sentence. Coach for calm confidence (no hype).
compliance_note: Avoid absolute claims. Describe what the guest can see/feel; confirm spec sheet for trim-only items.

guest_signals: Talks about control, flexibility, reliability, and not wanting surprises; values convenient access and easy day-to-day use.
recommended_trim_path: SEL → SEL Premium (then compare powertrains if applicable)
on_lot_handles: Convenience tech (phone key/remote functions where equipped); quick seat fold; cargo access; simple connectivity.
demo_60_seconds: Show access/convenience feature (where equipped). Demonstrate quick seat-fold and cargo space. Show how fast they can load/unload real-life gear.
translate_line: What that means for you is fewer obstacles and more control day-to-day.
invite_next_step: If you'd like, we can compare two trims quickly so you choose what gives you the most control for your needs.
coach_roleplay_prompt: Role-play: 'control' without sounding technical—keep it guest-friendly and simple.
compliance_note: Feature availability varies by trim/package. Confirm exact equipment on the vehicle in front of you.

guest_signals: Asks about value, ownership costs, efficiency, resale, and the smartest trim choice.
recommended_trim_path: SEL → SEL Premium (value step-up) → Limited (if the value case is clear)
on_lot_handles: Value step-up explanation (3 bullets); warranty/ownership story; efficiency/drive mode readouts where applicable.
demo_60_seconds: Give the '3-bullet value path': what changes from SEL to SEL Premium. Show one ownership-friendly feature and explain the ROI in plain English.
translate_line: What that means for you is getting the most return from every dollar you spend.
invite_next_step: Let's drive it and make sure the smart choice also feels right—then we can pick the best value trim.
coach_roleplay_prompt: Role-play: 'smart choice' explanation in 15 seconds with zero jargon.
compliance_note: Avoid quoting MPG/ratings unless verified on current spec sheet/Monroney.

guest_signals: Mentions family safety, confidence, warranties, safety systems, AWD, and predictability.
recommended_trim_path: SEL Premium → Limited → Calligraphy (focus on safety/driver-assist availability)
on_lot_handles: Safety/driver-assist walkaround (cameras/sensors); visibility; 'what it does for you' explanation.
demo_60_seconds: Point out key safety hardware locations. Show a safety display/setting in the cluster/infotainment. Translate to 'less stress every trip.'
translate_line: What that means for you is less stress—and more confidence every trip.
invite_next_step: On the test drive, I'll show you how the safety assists feel in real traffic so you can decide comfortably.
coach_roleplay_prompt: Role-play: explain one safety system in 10 seconds: what it is + what it means for them.
compliance_note: Do not claim safety ratings unless verified. Keep to features present on the vehicle.

guest_signals: Calls it a treat; wants something enjoyable daily; cares about comfort, sound, luxury feel, and 'wow'.
recommended_trim_path: Limited → Calligraphy (or premium trim) OR XRT-style package if adventure-reward fits
on_lot_handles: Comfort seating; premium audio moment; cabin quiet/ride quality; premium ambience settings where equipped.
demo_60_seconds: Seat them in front: adjust comfort feature. Play a favorite song briefly. Start the vehicle and point out the calm/quiet feel. Invite a short loop drive.
translate_line: What that means for you is enjoying the drive, not just owning the vehicle.
invite_next_step: Let's take a short loop—if it feels like a reward, you'll know quickly.
coach_roleplay_prompt: Coach: one memorable moment + one clean close line; stop talking after the close.
compliance_note: Avoid 'best ever' language. Let the experience do the selling.

guest_signals: Talks about family trips, friends, comfort for passengers, third-row usability, cargo, and shared experiences.
recommended_trim_path: SEL Premium → Limited → Calligraphy (prioritize comfort + family features)
on_lot_handles: 3-row comfort check; easy access to row 3; passenger communication feature where equipped; cargo flexibility.
demo_60_seconds: Invite them to sit in row 2 then row 3. Show how easy it is to access row 3. Fold seats to show cargo flexibility for real-life gear.
translate_line: What that means for you is everyone gets a good seat—and the plan actually works.
invite_next_step: Let's do a quick drive with everyone comfortable, then we can confirm the right trim for your 'we' needs.
coach_roleplay_prompt: Role-play: ask a 'we question' then demo row 3 without rushing.
compliance_note: Avoid quoting cargo/tow numbers unless verified. Use 'confirm spec sheet' if numbers are needed.
